title: AI-Powered Customer Service Chatbot
shortDescription: An intelligent chatbot that leverages LLMs to provide automated customer support with human-like interactions
markdownContent:
# AI-Powered Customer Service Chatbot

A sophisticated chatbot solution that transforms customer service operations by leveraging Large Language Models.

## Key Features

- **Natural Language Understanding**: Leverages OpenAI's GPT models for human-like conversations
- **Context Awareness**: Maintains conversation history for more coherent interactions
- **Multi-platform Integration**: Seamlessly works across web, mobile, and messaging platforms
- **Analytics Dashboard**: Real-time insights into customer interactions and satisfaction metrics

## Technical Implementation

- Backend built with FastAPI for high-performance API endpoints
- Frontend developed in React with TypeScript for type safety
- Redis for session management and caching
- Docker containerization for easy deployment

## Impact

- 70% reduction in customer service response time
- 85% customer satisfaction rate
- Handles over 1000 concurrent conversations

## Learnings

This project provided valuable insights into:
- Large Language Model fine-tuning and prompt engineering
- Real-time websocket communication
- Scalable architecture design
- UX design for conversational interfaces
